'''Thunder Sakura Crab''' is a Quest Item obtained in the "[[The Gourmet Supremos: The Seashore Strider]]" [[World Quest]] after picking up a crab near the [[Thunder Sakura]] to the east of the quest's start location. This Quest Item is then later given to [[Xudong]] during the same quest.
